job.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist (Remote, Global)
job.description:
Job Description

This is a remote position.

Execeptionly revolutionizes the software industry by eliminating outsourcing companies and directly matching talent with technology companies. Thanks to the remote work revolution, we observe the impacts of highly skilled software engineers worldwide getting paid up to 3x better and thriving with extraordinary professional challenges.

We're looking for a Talent Acquisition Specialist for supporting our Talent Acquisition efforts.

Daily life of a Talent Acquisition Specialist

  • Reports directly to the head of Talent Acquisition;
  • Review/prospect relevant talents for our clients in order to successfully provide the best options for them;
  • Manages her/his own calendar and activities on a daily basis;
  • Take care of the pipelines assigned to you to move candidates forward in the process;
  • Aligns best practices with Technical Evaluation team for best results

Requirements

  • 2+ years working in the IT recruiting market;
  • Ability to communicate in English fluently;
  • Enthusiasm on software engineering technologies;
  • Ambitions for next 10 years to become the best in a specific topic: Talent Acquisition, Operations, etc.;
  • Good understanding of Software Engineering terms and technologies for headhunting;
  • Good understanding of Google Apps (Drive, Gsheet, etc);
  • JIRA experience is a plus.
